attributes.action: Cancel the policy to restrict the freedom of over 70's.
attributes.additional_details:
This is morally and humanely wrong. It shows a complete lack of compassion for and understanding of the needs of the older person who are quite capable of taking sensible protective and proactive measures for themselves. 
I do NOT require to be TOLD how to live.
ADVISED ? Yes.
TOLD?
NO NO NO.
attributes.background:
It is well known that isolation and loneliness are major threats for the elderly - this will make it worse.
 Shopping?
Collecting pension.
Paying bills?
And those without internet access or knowledge?
Other age groups need eg clearer guidance to ALL about social distancing.

rejection.details: Since you started this petition, the Government has announced restrictions on all of the UK population. If you'd like that to change, you could start a petition calling for that action - either for all of the population or solely for elderly people.
